description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup for Nutanix AHV RESTful API. Grafana 7.x

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (last("repoTotalSpace") - last("repoFreeSpace")) * (100 / last("repoTotalSpace"))  FROM  "veeam_nutanix_repository" WHERE ("repoName" =~ /^$repository$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "repoName"  fill(none)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: $vanversion01 v$vanversion02 Build $vanversion06 $vanversion04 ($vanversion03) - IP $vanversion05 - Restore Points per VM (Backup)
$vanversion01 v$vanversion02 Build $vanversion06 $vanversion04 ($vanversion03) - IP $vanversion05 - Restore Points per VM (Snapshot)
$vanversion01 v$vanversion02 Build $vanversion06 $vanversion04 ($vanversion03) - IP $vanversion05 - Job Historical Performance and Duration
